title: Ookii 1-nensei to Chiisana 2-nensei

alternative_titles.en: The Big First-Grader and the Small Second-Grader
alternative_titles.ja: 大きい1年生と小さな2年生

synopsis:
Timid Masaya relies on his friend, second-grader Akiyo, to help him manage walking to school. Despite his tall stature, the path through a shadowy grove of trees is too frightening for him to enter alone.

When a flower Akiyo is holding falls apart, Masaya wants to do something to cheer her up. Unfortunately, the only place that he can get bellflowers is a faraway field in the shadows of a lone pine tree—and getting there will be a far more frightening journey than his already difficult daily commute.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
